name: WM Common Coupon Label for WooCommerce
author: Web Mumbai

sections.description:
“WM Coupon Label for WooCommerce” is use for Common coupon code. This is just a title for coupon code. This display after coupon code applied.

If you have an interest in customization this plugin please let me know.
sections.installation:
1. Install the WM Common Coupon Label for WooCommerce
  2. Activate the plugin
  3. WordPress Admin > Coupon > Add/Edit
sections.faq: Q: This product Pro Version availbale? A: No.
sections.changelog:
1.0.1 – 2016-01-01

  • Tested: tested in latest wordpress 4.4
  • Tested: tested in latest WooCommerce 2.4.12
  • Changed: Plugin name changed “Common Coupon Label for WooCommerce” to “WM Common Coupon Label for WooCommerce”

1.0 – 2015-09-17

  • Initial Release
